basics.name: Daniel Alejandro Toro Tobar
basics.label: Software Developer / Data Engineer
basics.summary: As a software developer, I have gained experience in a range of areas including data engineering, web development, data analytics, and process automation using tools such as Python, SQL and RPA. My passion for learning and overcoming challenges drives me to constantly improve my skills in software development and data engineering. I enjoy working on personal projects related to these topics and strive to become proficient in both fields.

work.name: Bancolombia
work.summary: As the leader of the Transformation Cell in Servicios Regionales Especializados at Bancolombia, I analyze and transform management information using Python, SQL, Spark, and SAS to drive data-driven decision-making. I develop and optimize data pipelines to integrate and structure information within Bancolombia’s data warehouse, ensuring reliable and accessible data sources that support operational efficiency and digital transformation.

work.name: Bancolombia
work.summary: As an Analyst III in the Vice Presidency of Regional Services at Bancolombia, I am responsible for analyzing and transforming data using SQL, Python, and SAS to support decision-making. I query Bancolombia’s data warehouse to extract relevant information and develop insightful reports in Power BI, ensuring effective data visualization and strategic analysis for the Regional Services Management team.

work.name: Bancolombia
work.summary: To support transformation processes in the Specialized Regional Services Management by leveraging automation. I developed and maintained software tools for end users using programming languages such as Python and Visual Basic, enhancing operational efficiency and streamlining workflows.

work.name: Weber Solutions
work.summary: I was responsible for automating processes using bots created with the BluePrism tool. My role included designing and documenting automation solutions to enhance efficiency and streamline business operations.

work.name: Fhuryx
work.summary: I was responsible for developing web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP (Laravel). I worked with relational databases by writing SQL queries in MySQL and built static websites using WordPress, contributing to the creation of dynamic and user-friendly web solutions.
